entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi incomplete/inconsistent enum handling #58195
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi specifies non-nullable get-only properties as nullable #58192
  • Add the ability to load a component using a File path. #58188
  • Asset fingerprinting does not work for `_content` and `_framework` files #58187
  • OpenApi: The IEndpointParameterMetadataProvider is not used for Controllers #58178

Closed

  • JavaScript InterOp Error : Can't find JavaScript function #58071
  • Use collection expression for ASP.NET Core Web API project template's WeatherForecastController.cs #58175
  • PasswordValidator should not throw when password is null #58133
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes #58177
  • Retry ConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate #58169
  • SignalR JS client incorrectly appends Authorization header #58146
  • Dockerized ASP.NET Core Blazor .NET 9 RC 1 static assets issue #57898

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #58198
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #58197
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add examples for attributes #58196
    area-mvc
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Enable signing on Non-Windows builds #58191
    area-infrastructure
  • Update efcore without runtime to help net10 flow #58190
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58186
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `6dae7eb` #58185
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0953a17` to `6dae7eb` #58184
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58183
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `6dae7eb` #58180
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #58179
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Avoid unnecessary HealthStatus comparison #58176
    area-networking
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #58173
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Fixed to not throw an exception when password is null. #58168
    area-identity, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Use collection expression for ASP.NET Core Web API project template's WeatherForecastController.cs #58194
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57967
    Servicing-approved, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 9.0.0
  • Quarantine ResponseTests.ConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate #58189
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Update Selenium package version #58163
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Add note about perf to Http3SampleApp #58171
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Run static code analysis on IIS #58167
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #58035
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Stop using Mac 11 in Helix #58063
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Implement the Mvc PushFileStreamResult API #58161
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57966
    Servicing-approved, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0.x
